definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: You can by hand small pushes, so that lymph flow more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 可以用手轻轻地推按，使淋巴的流动更顺畅。

sentences.english: The scientists took tissues from fetal liver, and lymph glands .
sentences.chinese: 科学家从胎儿肝和淋巴腺获得组织。

sentences.english: These results suggest that pathway which cancer cells entered lymphatics was mainly by destructing walls of lymphatics.
sentences.chinese: 提示癌细胞进入淋巴管的途径以破坏管壁为主。

sentences.english: Twists can help detoxify the internal organs and lymphatic system.
sentences.chinese: 扭转有助于提高内部器官和淋巴系统的解毒功能。

sentences.english: Objective To study CT value in diagnosing cystic lymphangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨CT对囊性淋巴管瘤的诊断价值。

sentences.english: It is the most common type of extranodal low-grade B cell lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 它是结外低度恶性B细胞淋巴瘤中最常见的一型。

sentences.english: The lymphoedema of the right lower limb gradually subsided with softening of the skin after operation.
sentences.chinese: 右下肢的淋巴水肿在手术后逐渐改善并且皮肤变软。

sentences.english: Nodal NK-cell lymphoma are quite rare.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴结中，NK细胞淋巴瘤很少。

sentences.english: Nodal NK-cell lymphoma are quite rare.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴结中，NK细胞淋巴瘤很少。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore CT features and diagnostic value of castleman disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨淋巴结增生症的CT表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: The lymphatic system drains and filters the body’s fluids.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴系统会输送并过滤人体的体液。

sentences.english: The lymphoblasts in thymus possess membrane ALPase activity.
sentences.chinese: 胸腺内淋巴母细胞具有膜性ALP。

sentences.english: Results There were significant changes in diaphragmatic peritoneal mesothelium and lymphatic capillaries.
sentences.chinese: 结果膈腹膜间皮和膈毛细淋巴管均发生了明显的变化。

sentences.english: Dysregulation of the pathway involves in T lymphoblastic leukemia and other diseases.
sentences.chinese: 该通路的失调将导致T细胞淋巴瘤等疾病的发生。

sentences.english: Objective To establish and preserve the immortal lymphoblastoid cell lines of the Baiku Yao population in china.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立和保存白裤瑶B淋巴母细胞永生细胞株。

sentences.english: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) is a highly heterogeneous disease.
sentences.chinese: 弥漫大B细胞淋巴瘤是一种高度异质性疾病。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
